content: Who is the mother of Bill Gates?
Mary Maxwell Gates was the mother of Bill Gates.
William Henry Gates III, also known as Bill Gates Sr., was the father of Bill Gates.
Bill Gates' parents, William Henry Gates III and Mary Maxwell Gates, were married in 1951.
What is their individual net worth?
Bill Gates Sr. had an estimated net worth of around $10 million, while the net worth of Bill Gates' mother, Mary Maxwell Gates, is not publicly known.
